title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4254.9 - Contractor and Supplier Diversity and Non-Discrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4254.9 - Contractor and Supplier Diversity and Non-Discrimination

State Regulations

Pursuant to New York State Executive Law article 15-A, the
corporation recognizes its obligation under the law to promote opportunities
for maximum feasible participation of certified minority- and women-owned
business enterprises ("MWBEs") in the performance of the corporation's
contracts. The corporation's Office of Contractor and Supplier Diversity has
determined that it is not practical or feasible to assign MWBE contract goals
to expenditures made under this program. Notes

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
